overview: In 2011, a movie biography of Guo Mingyi was Produced. The movie was directed by Chen Guoxing and Wang Jing, with the lead part played by Hou Yong and supporting parts by Jiang Hongbo, Li Qin and Feng.

production_companies.name: North United Group Of Film And Television

tagline: Learn from 'Lei Feng' - the role model of members of CPC
title: Guo Ming Yi
